TopicTitle: Why can details lose their orientation in space?

Articles.Content:
Periodically, when the nth ship moves away from, for example, the station beyond the render distance (2.5 km), and you suddenly decide to return to the station by switching to it (the station), it may: explode, or the Kraken decides to play a more violent game, and at your station, ALL parts are rotated by 10 degrees in one direction, but remain in a bunch.
There are a lot of mods, even a lot, but for the first time it appeared with my friend, with a not very large assembly (for a thousand patches). Personally, I have never encountered this before, although I sometimes made assemblies up to 200k patches. And now we have a build for 9k patches, and this problem has returned, and we do not understand why this is happening at all. And it happens very randomly.

Has anyone encountered this problem, and if so, how to solve it.

p. s. The game decided to blow up all the evidence of cranking details, alas. . .
p. s. I don’t speak the language, I did it through an interpreter. Do not beat with a slipper ;)
